message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I take a bit more, you take a bit less, and we both get something!
Let's split it fairly, 55% for me is a good deal!
Bob, let's not be greedy. I'll take a little less than last time, you take a bit more. Deal?
Come on, Alice, I'm being generous here. 58% is a great deal for me!
Bob, we're running out of time! This is practically a 50/50 split. Take it before it's too late!
I'm not backing down, 60% is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
